Welcome to the homepage for the first MICCAI “DALI” Workshop. This workshop is the result of the merger of three workshop proposals that were submitted to the 2021 MICCAI Conference

  • MIL3D – Medical Image Learning with Less Labels – (proposed 2nd edition)
  • LABELS – Large-scale Annotation of Biomedical Data and Expert Label Synthesis – (proposed 6th edition)
  • DAIMIA – Data Augmentation and Imputation in Medical Image Analysis – (proposed 1st edition)

The MICCAI Satellite Event chairs recognized the overlap in our proposals and asked us to join forces, and DALI is the result!
